R32.nl_constraint: Rock analysis from waypoint1 should be performed first

children.nl_constraint: No rover should have rock analysis from waypoint0 until some rover has rock analysis from waypoint1

<documents>
<pddl_domain>
;; Enrico Scala (enricos83@gmail.com) and Miquel Ramirez (miquel.ramirez@gmail.com)
(define (domain rover)
       (:requirements :typing :fluents)
       (:types
              rover -object
              waypoint -object
              store -object
              camera -object
              mode -object
              lander -object
              objective -object
       )
       (:predicates
              (in ?x - rover ?y - waypoint)
              (at_lander ?x - lander ?y - waypoint)
              (can_traverse ?r - rover ?x - waypoint ?y - waypoint)
              (equipped_for_soil_analysis ?r - rover)
              (equipped_for_rock_analysis ?r - rover)
              (equipped_for_imaging ?r - rover)
              (empty ?s - store)
              (have_rock_analysis ?r - rover ?w - waypoint)
              (have_soil_analysis ?r - rover ?w - waypoint)
              (full ?s - store)
              (calibrated ?c - camera ?r - rover)
              (supports ?c - camera ?m - mode)
              (available ?r - rover)
              (visible ?w - waypoint ?p - waypoint)
              (have_image ?r - rover ?o - objective ?m - mode)
              (communicated_soil_data ?w - waypoint)
              (communicated_rock_data ?w - waypoint)
              (communicated_image_data ?o - objective ?m - mode)
              (at_soil_sample ?w - waypoint)
              (at_rock_sample ?w - waypoint)
              (visible_from ?o - objective ?w - waypoint)
              (store_of ?s - store ?r - rover)
              (calibration_target ?i - camera ?o - objective)
              (on_board ?i - camera ?r - rover)
              (channel_free ?l - lander)
              (in_sun ?w - waypoint)
       )

       (:functions
              (energy ?r - rover)
              (recharges)
              (total-energy-used)
              (n_navigate ?x - rover ?y - waypoint ?z - waypoint)
              (n_recharge ?x - rover ?w - waypoint)
              (n_samplesoil ?x - rover ?s - store ?p - waypoint)
              (n_samplerock ?x - rover ?s - store ?p - waypoint)
              (n_drop ?x - rover ?y - store)
              (n_calibrate ?r - rover ?i - camera ?t - objective ?w - waypoint)
              (n_takeimage ?r - rover ?p - waypoint ?o - objective ?i - camera ?m - mode)
              (n_communicatesoildata ?r - rover ?l - lander ?p - waypoint ?x - waypoint ?y - waypoint)
              (n_communicaterockdata ?r - rover ?l - lander ?p - waypoint ?x - waypoint ?y - waypoint)
              (n_communicateimagedata ?r - rover ?l - lander ?o - objective ?m - mode ?x - waypoint ?y - waypoint)
       )

       (:action navigate
              :parameters (?x - rover ?y - waypoint ?z - waypoint)
              :precondition (and (can_traverse ?x ?y ?z) (available ?x) (in ?x ?y)
                     (visible ?y ?z) (>= (energy ?x) 8)
              )
              :effect (and
                     (decrease (energy ?x) 8)
                     (increase (total-energy-used) 8)
                     (not (in ?x ?y))
                     (in ?x ?z)
                     (increase (n_navigate ?x ?y ?z) 1)
              )
       )

       (:action recharge
              :parameters (?x - rover ?w - waypoint)
              :precondition (and (in ?x ?w) (in_sun ?w) (<= (energy ?x) 80))
              :effect (and (increase (energy ?x) 20) (increase (recharges) 1)
                     (increase (n_recharge ?x ?w) 1)
              )
       )

       (:action samplesoil
              :parameters (?x - rover ?s - store ?p - waypoint)
              :precondition (and (in ?x ?p)
                     (>= (energy ?x) 3) (at_soil_sample ?p) (equipped_for_soil_analysis ?x) (store_of ?s ?x) (empty ?s)
              )
              :effect (and
                     (not (empty ?s))
                     (full ?s)
                     (decrease (energy ?x) 3)
                     (increase (total-energy-used) 3)
                     (have_soil_analysis ?x ?p)
                     (not (at_soil_sample ?p))
                     (increase (n_samplesoil ?x ?s ?p) 1)
              )
       )

       (:action samplerock
              :parameters (?x - rover ?s - store ?p - waypoint)
              :precondition (and (in ?x ?p) (>= (energy ?x) 5)
                     (at_rock_sample ?p) (equipped_for_rock_analysis ?x) (store_of ?s ?x)(empty ?s)
              )
              :effect (and
                     (not (empty ?s))
                     (full ?s)
                     (decrease (energy ?x) 5)
                     (increase (total-energy-used) 5)
                     (have_rock_analysis ?x ?p)
                     (not (at_rock_sample ?p))
                     (increase (n_samplerock ?x ?s ?p) 1)
              )
       )

       (:action drop
              :parameters (?x - rover ?y - store)
              :precondition (and (store_of ?y ?x) (full ?y) (>= (energy ?x) 1)
              )
              :effect (and (not (full ?y)) (empty ?y)
                     (increase (n_drop ?x ?y) 1)
                     (decrease (energy ?x) 1)
                     (increase (total-energy-used) 1)
              )
       )

       (:action calibrate
              :parameters (?r - rover ?i - camera ?t - objective ?w - waypoint)
              :precondition (and (equipped_for_imaging ?r) (>= (energy ?r) 2)(calibration_target ?i ?t) (in ?r ?w) (visible_from ?t ?w)(on_board ?i ?r)
              )
              :effect (and
                     (decrease (energy ?r) 2)
                     (increase (total-energy-used) 2)
                     (calibrated ?i ?r)
                     (increase (n_calibrate ?r ?i ?t ?w) 1)
              )
       )

       (:action takeimage
              :parameters (?r - rover ?p - waypoint ?o - objective ?i - camera ?m - mode)
              :precondition (and (calibrated ?i ?r)
                     (on_board ?i ?r)
                     (equipped_for_imaging ?r)
                     (supports ?i ?m)
                     (visible_from ?o ?p)
                     (in ?r ?p)
                     (>= (energy ?r) 1)
              )
              :effect (and (have_image ?r ?o ?m)
                     (not (calibrated ?i ?r))
                     (decrease (energy ?r) 1)
                     (increase (total-energy-used) 1)
                     (increase (n_takeimage ?r ?p ?o ?i ?m) 1)
              )
       )

       (:action communicatesoildata
              :parameters (?r - rover ?l - lander ?p - waypoint ?x - waypoint ?y - waypoint)
              :precondition (and (in ?r ?x)
                     (at_lander ?l ?y)(have_soil_analysis ?r ?p)
                     (visible ?x ?y)(available ?r)(channel_free ?l)
                     (>= (energy ?r) 4)
              )
              :effect (and (communicated_soil_data ?p)(available ?r)
                     (decrease (energy ?r) 4)
                     (increase (total-energy-used) 4)
                     (increase
                            (n_communicatesoildata ?r ?l ?p ?x ?y)
                            1)
              )
       )

       (:action communicaterockdata
              :parameters (?r - rover ?l - lander ?p - waypoint ?x - waypoint ?y - waypoint)
              :precondition (and (in ?r ?x)
                     (at_lander ?l ?y)(have_rock_analysis ?r ?p)
                     (>= (energy ?r) 4)
                     (visible ?x ?y)(available ?r)(channel_free ?l)
              )
              :effect (and
                     (communicated_rock_data ?p)(available ?r)
                     (decrease (energy ?r) 4)
                     (increase (total-energy-used) 4)
                     (increase
                            (n_communicaterockdata ?r ?l ?p ?x ?y)
                            1)
              )
       )

       (:action communicateimagedata
              :parameters (?r - rover ?l - lander ?o - objective ?m - mode ?x - waypoint ?y - waypoint)
              :precondition (and (in ?r ?x)
                     (at_lander ?l ?y)(have_image ?r ?o ?m)(visible ?x ?y)(available ?r)(channel_free ?l)
                     (>= (energy ?r) 6)
              )
              :effect (and
                     (communicated_image_data ?o ?m)(available ?r)
                     (decrease (energy ?r) 6)
                     (increase (total-energy-used) 6)
                     (increase
                            (n_communicateimagedata ?r ?l ?o ?m ?x ?y)
                            1)
              )
       )
)
</pddl_domain>

"No rover should have rock analysis from waypoint0 until some rover has rock analysis from waypoint1"

This is a temporal constraint that states:
- Before any rover gets rock analysis from waypoint1, no rover should have rock analysis from waypoint0
- Once some rover has rock analysis from waypoint1, then rovers can have rock analysis from waypoint0

In PDDL3.0, this would be expressed using temporal logic operators. Let me think about the structure:

Looking at the domain, I can see there's a predicate:
(have_rock_analysis ?r - rover ?w - waypoint)

So the constraint is saying:
- Until (some rover has rock analysis from waypoint1), no rover should have rock analysis from waypoint0

In PDDL3.0 temporal logic, this can be expressed as:
(until (exists (?r - rover) (have_rock_analysis ?r waypoint1))
       (forall (?r - rover) (not (have_rock_analysis ?r waypoint0))))

       (not (exists (?r - rover) (have_rock_analysis ?r waypoint0))))

This reads as: "Until there exists some rover that has rock analysis from waypoint1, it should not be the case that there exists any rover that has rock analysis from waypoint0."

Actually, let me reconsider. The constraint "No rover should have rock analysis from waypoint0 until some rover has rock analysis from waypoint1" can be interpreted as:

- It should always be the case that if no rover has rock analysis from waypoint1, then no rover should have rock analysis from waypoint0

This could be expressed as:
(always (imply (not (exists (?r - rover) (have_rock_analysis ?r waypoint1)))
               (not (exists (?r - rover) (have_rock_analysis ?r waypoint0)))))

;; Enrico Scala (enricos83@gmail.com) and Miquel Ramirez (miquel.ramirez@gmail.com)
(define (domain rover)
       (:requirements :typing :fluents)
       (:types
              rover -object
              waypoint -object
              store -object
              camera -object
              mode -object
              lander -object
              objective -object
       )
       (:predicates
              (in ?x - rover ?y - waypoint)
              (at_lander ?x - lander ?y - waypoint)
              (can_traverse ?r - rover ?x - waypoint ?y - waypoint)
              (equipped_for_soil_analysis ?r - rover)
              (equipped_for_rock_analysis ?r - rover)
              (equipped_for_imaging ?r - rover)
              (empty ?s - store)
              (have_rock_analysis ?r - rover ?w - waypoint)
              (have_soil_analysis ?r - rover ?w - waypoint)
              (full ?s - store)
              (calibrated ?c - camera ?r - rover)
              (supports ?c - camera ?m - mode)
              (available ?r - rover)
              (visible ?w - waypoint ?p - waypoint)
              (have_image ?r - rover ?o - objective ?m - mode)
              (communicated_soil_data ?w - waypoint)
              (communicated_rock_data ?w - waypoint)
              (communicated_image_data ?o - objective ?m - mode)
              (at_soil_sample ?w - waypoint)
              (at_rock_sample ?w - waypoint)
              (visible_from ?o - objective ?w - waypoint)
              (store_of ?s - store ?r - rover)
              (calibration_target ?i - camera ?o - objective)
              (on_board ?i - camera ?r - rover)
              (channel_free ?l - lander)
              (in_sun ?w - waypoint)
       )

       (:functions
              (energy ?r - rover)
              (recharges)
              (total-energy-used)
              (n_navigate ?x - rover ?y - waypoint ?z - waypoint)
              (n_recharge ?x - rover ?w - waypoint)
              (n_samplesoil ?x - rover ?s - store ?p - waypoint)
              (n_samplerock ?x - rover ?s - store ?p - waypoint)
              (n_drop ?x - rover ?y - store)
              (n_calibrate ?r - rover ?i - camera ?t - objective ?w - waypoint)
              (n_takeimage ?r - rover ?p - waypoint ?o - objective ?i - camera ?m - mode)
              (n_communicatesoildata ?r - rover ?l - lander ?p - waypoint ?x - waypoint ?y - waypoint)
              (n_communicaterockdata ?r - rover ?l - lander ?p - waypoint ?x - waypoint ?y - waypoint)
              (n_communicateimagedata ?r - rover ?l - lander ?o - objective ?m - mode ?x - waypoint ?y - waypoint)
       )

       (:action navigate
              :parameters (?x - rover ?y - waypoint ?z - waypoint)
              :precondition (and (can_traverse ?x ?y ?z) (available ?x) (in ?x ?y)
                     (visible ?y ?z) (>= (energy ?x) 8)
              )
              :effect (and
                     (decrease (energy ?x) 8)
                     (increase (total-energy-used) 8)
                     (not (in ?x ?y))
                     (in ?x ?z)
                     (increase (n_navigate ?x ?y ?z) 1)
              )
       )

       (:action recharge
              :parameters (?x - rover ?w - waypoint)
              :precondition (and (in ?x ?w) (in_sun ?w) (<= (energy ?x) 80))
              :effect (and (increase (energy ?x) 20) (increase (recharges) 1)
                     (increase (n_recharge ?x ?w) 1)
              )
       )

       (:action samplesoil
              :parameters (?x - rover ?s - store ?p - waypoint)
              :precondition (and (in ?x ?p)
                     (>= (energy ?x) 3) (at_soil_sample ?p) (equipped_for_soil_analysis ?x) (store_of ?s ?x) (empty ?s)
              )
              :effect (and
                     (not (empty ?s))
                     (full ?s)
                     (decrease (energy ?x) 3)
                     (increase (total-energy-used) 3)

<pddl_domain>
;; Enrico Scala (enricos83@gmail.com) and Miquel Ramirez (miquel.ramirez@gmail.com)
(define (domain rover)
       (:requirements :typing :fluents)
       (:types
              rover -object
              waypoint -object
              store -object
              camera -object
              mode -object
              lander -object
              objective -object
       )
       (:predicates
              (in ?x - rover ?y - waypoint)
              (at_lander ?x - lander ?y - waypoint)
              (can_traverse ?r - rover ?x - waypoint ?y - waypoint)
              (equipped_for_soil_analysis ?r - rover)
              (equipped_for_rock_analysis ?r - rover)
              (equipped_for_imaging ?r - rover)
              (empty ?s - store)
              (have_rock_analysis ?r - rover ?w - waypoint)
              (have_soil_analysis ?r - rover ?w - waypoint)
              (full ?s - store)
              (calibrated ?c - camera ?r - rover)
              (supports ?c - camera ?m - mode)
              (available ?r - rover)
              (visible ?w - waypoint ?p - waypoint)
              (have_image ?r - rover ?o - objective ?m - mode)
              (communicated_soil_data ?w - waypoint)
              (communicated_rock_data ?w - waypoint)
              (communicated_image_data ?o - objective ?m - mode)
              (at_soil_sample ?w - waypoint)
              (at_rock_sample ?w - waypoint)
              (visible_from ?o - objective ?w - waypoint)
              (store_of ?s - store ?r - rover)
              (calibration_target ?i - camera ?o - objective)
              (on_board ?i - camera ?r - rover)
              (channel_free ?l - lander)
              (in_sun ?w - waypoint)
       )

       (:functions
              (energy ?r - rover)
              (recharges)
              (total-energy-used)
              (n_navigate ?x - rover ?y - waypoint ?z - waypoint)
              (n_recharge ?x - rover ?w - waypoint)
              (n_samplesoil ?x - rover ?s - store ?p - waypoint)
              (n_samplerock ?x - rover ?s - store ?p - waypoint)
              (n_drop ?x - rover ?y - store)
              (n_calibrate ?r - rover ?i - camera ?t - objective ?w - waypoint)
              (n_takeimage ?r - rover ?p - waypoint ?o - objective ?i - camera ?m - mode)
              (n_communicatesoildata ?r - rover ?l - lander ?p - waypoint ?x - waypoint ?y - waypoint)
              (n_communicaterockdata ?r - rover ?l - lander ?p - waypoint ?x - waypoint ?y - waypoint)
              (n_communicateimagedata ?r - rover ?l - lander ?o - objective ?m - mode ?x - waypoint ?y - waypoint)
       )

       (:action navigate
              :parameters (?x - rover ?y - waypoint ?z - waypoint)
              :precondition (and (can_traverse ?x ?y ?z) (available ?x) (in ?x ?y)
                     (visible ?y ?z) (>= (energy ?x) 8)
              )
              :effect (and
                     (decrease (energy ?x) 8)
                     (increase (total-energy-used) 8)
                     (not (in ?x ?y))
                     (in ?x ?z)
                     (increase (n_navigate ?x ?y ?z) 1)
              )
       )

       (:action recharge
              :parameters (?x - rover ?w - waypoint)
              :precondition (and (in ?x ?w) (in_sun ?w) (<= (energy ?x) 80))
              :effect (and (increase (energy ?x) 20) (increase (recharges) 1)
                     (increase (n_recharge ?x ?w) 1)
              )
       )

       (:action samplesoil
              :parameters (?x - rover ?s - store ?p - waypoint)
              :precondition (and (in ?x ?p)
                     (>= (energy ?x) 3) (at_soil_sample ?p) (equipped_for_soil_analysis ?x) (store_of ?s ?x) (empty ?s)
              )
              :effect (and
                     (not (empty ?s))
                     (full ?s)
                     (decrease (energy ?x) 3)
                     (increase (total-energy-used) 3)
                     (have_soil_analysis ?x ?p)
                     (not (at_soil_sample ?p))
                     (increase (n_samplesoil ?x ?s ?p) 1)
              )
       )

       (:action samplerock
              :parameters (?x - rover ?s - store ?p - waypoint)
              :precondition (and (in ?x ?p) (>= (energy ?x) 5)
                     (at_rock_sample ?p) (equipped_for_rock_analysis ?x) (store_of ?s ?x)(empty ?s)
              )
              :effect (and
                     (not (empty ?s))
                     (full ?s)
                     (decrease (energy ?x) 5)
                     (increase (total-energy-used) 5)
                     (have_rock_analysis ?x ?p)
                     (not (at_rock_sample ?p))
                     (increase (n_samplerock ?x ?s ?p) 1)
              )
       )

       (:action drop
              :parameters (?x - rover ?y - store)
              :precondition (and (store_of ?y ?x) (full ?y) (>= (energy ?x) 1)
              )
              :effect (and (not (full ?y)) (empty ?y)
                     (increase (n_drop ?x ?y) 1)
                     (decrease (energy ?x) 1)
                     (increase (total-energy-used) 1)
              )
       )

       (:action calibrate
              :parameters (?r - rover ?i - camera ?t - objective ?w - waypoint)
              :precondition (and (equipped_for_imaging ?r) (>= (energy ?r) 2)(calibration_target ?i ?t) (in ?r ?w) (visible_from ?t ?w)(on_board ?i ?r)
              )
              :effect (and
                     (decrease (energy ?r) 2)
                     (increase (total-energy-used) 2)
                     (calibrated ?i ?r)
                     (increase (n_calibrate ?r ?i ?t ?w) 1)
              )
       )

       (:action takeimage
              :parameters (?r - rover ?p - waypoint ?o - objective ?i - camera ?m - mode)
              :precondition (and (calibrated ?i ?r)
                     (on_board ?i ?r)
                     (equipped_for_imaging ?r)
                     (supports ?i ?m)
                     (visible_from ?o ?p)
                     (in ?r ?p)
                     (>= (energy ?r) 1)
              )
              :effect (and (have_image ?r ?o ?m)
                     (not (calibrated ?i ?r))
                     (decrease (energy ?r) 1)
                     (increase (total-energy-used) 1)
                     (increase (n_takeimage ?r ?p ?o ?i ?m) 1)
              )
       )

       (:action communicatesoildata
              :parameters (?r - rover ?l - lander ?p - waypoint ?x - waypoint ?y - waypoint)
              :precondition (and (in ?r ?x)
                     (at_lander ?l ?y)(have_soil_analysis ?r ?p)
                     (visible ?x ?y)(available ?r)(channel_free ?l)
                     (>= (energy ?r) 4)
              )
              :effect (and (communicated_soil_data ?p)(available ?r)
                     (decrease (energy ?r) 4)
                     (increase (total-energy-used) 4)
                     (increase
                            (n_communicatesoildata ?r ?l ?p ?x ?y)
                            1)
              )
       )

       (:action communicaterockdata
              :parameters (?r - rover ?l - lander ?p - waypoint ?x - waypoint ?y - waypoint)
              :precondition (and (in ?r ?x)
                     (at_lander ?l ?y)(have_rock_analysis ?r ?p)
                     (>= (energy ?r) 4)
                     (visible ?x ?y)(available ?r)(channel_free ?l)
              )
              :effect (and
                     (communicated_rock_data ?p)(available ?r)
                     (decrease (energy ?r) 4)
                     (increase (total-energy-used) 4)
                     (increase
                            (n_communicaterockdata ?r ?l ?p ?x ?y)
                            1)
              )
       )

       (:action communicateimagedata
              :parameters (?r - rover ?l - lander ?o - objective ?m - mode ?x - waypoint ?y - waypoint)
              :precondition (and (in ?r ?x)
                     (at_lander ?l ?y)(have_image ?r ?o ?m)(visible ?x ?y)(available ?r)(channel_free ?l)
                     (>= (energy ?r) 6)
              )
              :effect (and
                     (communicated_image_data ?o ?m)(available ?r)
                     (decrease (energy ?r) 6)
                     (increase (total-energy-used) 6)
                     (increase
                            (n_communicateimagedata ?r ?l ?o ?m ?x ?y)
                            1)
              )
       )
)

<pddl_domain>
;; Enrico Scala (enricos83@gmail.com) and Miquel Ramirez (miquel.ramirez@gmail.com)
(define (domain rover)
       (:requirements :typing :fluents)
       (:types
              rover -object
              waypoint -object
              store -object
              camera -object
              mode -object
              lander -object
              objective -object
       )
       (:predicates
              (in ?x - rover ?y - waypoint)
              (at_lander ?x - lander ?y - waypoint)
              (can_traverse ?r - rover ?x - waypoint ?y - waypoint)
              (equipped_for_soil_analysis ?r - rover)
              (equipped_for_rock_analysis ?r - rover)
              (equipped_for_imaging ?r - rover)
              (empty ?s - store)
              (have_rock_analysis ?r - rover ?w - waypoint)
              (have_soil_analysis ?r - rover ?w - waypoint)
              (full ?s - store)
              (calibrated ?c - camera ?r - rover)
              (supports ?c - camera ?m - mode)
              (available ?r - rover)
              (visible ?w - waypoint ?p - waypoint)
              (have_image ?r - rover ?o - objective ?m - mode)
              (communicated_soil_data ?w - waypoint)
              (communicated_rock_data ?w - waypoint)
              (communicated_image_data ?o - objective ?m - mode)
              (at_soil_sample ?w - waypoint)
              (at_rock_sample ?w - waypoint)
              (visible_from ?o - objective ?w - waypoint)
              (store_of ?s - store ?r - rover)
              (calibration_target ?i - camera ?o - objective)
              (on_board ?i - camera ?r - rover)
              (channel_free ?l - lander)
              (in_sun ?w - waypoint)
       )

       (:functions
              (energy ?r - rover)
              (recharges)
              (total-energy-used)
              (n_navigate ?x - rover ?y - waypoint ?z - waypoint)
              (n_recharge ?x - rover ?w - waypoint)
              (n_samplesoil ?x - rover ?s - store ?p - waypoint)
              (n_samplerock ?x - rover ?s - store ?p - waypoint)
              (n_drop ?x - rover ?y - store)
              (n_calibrate ?r - rover ?i - camera ?t - objective ?w - waypoint)
              (n_takeimage ?r - rover ?p - waypoint ?o - objective ?i - camera ?m - mode)
              (n_communicatesoildata ?r - rover ?l - lander ?p - waypoint ?x - waypoint ?y - waypoint)
              (n_communicaterockdata ?r - rover ?l - lander ?p - waypoint ?x - waypoint ?y - waypoint)
              (n_communicateimagedata ?r - rover ?l - lander ?o - objective ?m - mode ?x - waypoint ?y - waypoint)
       )

       (:action navigate
              :parameters (?x - rover ?y - waypoint ?z - waypoint)
              :precondition (and (can_traverse ?x ?y ?z) (available ?x) (in ?x ?y)
                     (visible ?y ?z) (>= (energy ?x) 8)
              )
              :effect (and
                     (decrease (energy ?x) 8)
                     (increase (total-energy-used) 8)
                     (not (in ?x ?y))
                     (in ?x ?z)
                     (increase (n_navigate ?x ?y ?z) 1)
              )
       )

       (:action recharge
              :parameters (?x - rover ?w - waypoint)
              :precondition (and (in ?x ?w) (in_sun ?w) (<= (energy ?x) 80))
              :effect (and (increase (energy ?x) 20) (increase (recharges) 1)
                     (increase (n_recharge ?x ?w) 1)
              )
       )

       (:action samplesoil
              :parameters (?x - rover ?s - store ?p - waypoint)
              :precondition (and (in ?x ?p)
                     (>= (energy ?x) 3) (at_soil_sample ?p) (equipped_for_soil_analysis ?x) (store_of ?s ?x) (empty ?s)
              )
              :effect (and
                     (not (empty ?s))
                     (full ?s)
                     (decrease (energy ?x) 3)
                     (increase (total-energy-used) 3)
                     (have_soil_analysis ?x ?p)
                     (not (at_soil_sample ?p))
                     (increase (n_samplesoil ?x ?s ?p) 1)
              )
       )

       (:action samplerock
              :parameters (?x - rover ?s - store ?p - waypoint)
              :precondition (and (in ?x ?p) (>= (energy ?x) 5)
                     (at_rock_sample ?p) (equipped_for_rock_analysis ?x) (store_of ?s ?x)(empty ?s)
              )
              :effect (and
                     (not (empty ?s))
                     (full ?s)
                     (decrease (energy ?x) 5)
                     (increase (total-energy-used) 5)
                     (have_rock_analysis ?x ?p)
                     (not (at_rock_sample ?p))
                     (increase (n_samplerock ?x ?s ?p) 1)
              )
       )

       (:action drop
              :parameters (?x - rover ?y - store)
              :precondition (and (store_of ?y ?x) (full ?y) (>= (energy ?x) 1)
              )
              :effect (and (not (full ?y)) (empty ?y)
                     (increase (n_drop ?x ?y) 1)
                     (decrease (energy ?x) 1)
                     (increase (total-energy-used) 1)
              )
       )

       (:action calibrate
              :parameters (?r - rover ?i - camera ?t - objective ?w - waypoint)
              :precondition (and (equipped_for_imaging ?r) (>= (energy ?r) 2)(calibration_target ?i ?t) (in ?r ?w) (visible_from ?t ?w)(on_board ?i ?r)
              )
              :effect (and
                     (decrease (energy ?r) 2)
                     (increase (total-energy-used) 2)
                     (calibrated ?i ?r)
                     (increase (n_calibrate ?r ?i ?t ?w) 1)
              )
       )

       (:action takeimage
              :parameters (?r - rover ?p - waypoint ?o - objective ?i - camera ?m - mode)
              :precondition (and (calibrated ?i ?r)
                     (on_board ?i ?r)
                     (equipped_for_imaging ?r)
                     (supports ?i ?m)
                     (visible_from ?o ?p)
                     (in ?r ?p)
                     (>= (energy ?r) 1)
              )
              :effect (and (have_image ?r ?o ?m)
                     (not (calibrated ?i ?r))
                     (decrease (energy ?r) 1)
                     (increase (total-energy-used) 1)
                     (increase (n_takeimage ?r ?p ?o ?i ?m) 1)
              )
       )

       (:action communicatesoildata
              :parameters (?r - rover ?l - lander ?p - waypoint ?x - waypoint ?y - waypoint)
              :precondition (and (in ?r ?x)
                     (at_lander ?l ?y)(have_soil_analysis ?r ?p)
                     (visible ?x ?y)(available ?r)(channel_free ?l)
                     (>= (energy ?r) 4)
              )
              :effect (and (communicated_soil_data ?p)(available ?r)
                     (decrease (energy ?r) 4)
                     (increase (total-energy-used) 4)
                     (increase
                            (n_communicatesoildata ?r ?l ?p ?x ?y)
                            1)
              )
       )

       (:action communicaterockdata
              :parameters (?r - rover ?l - lander ?p - waypoint ?x - waypoint ?y - waypoint)
              :precondition (and (in ?r ?x)
                     (at_lander ?l ?y)(have_rock_analysis ?r ?p)
                     (>= (energy ?r) 4)
                     (visible ?x ?y)(available ?r)(channel_free ?l)
              )
              :effect (and
                     (communicated_rock_data ?p)(available ?r)
                     (decrease (energy ?r) 4)
                     (increase (total-energy-used) 4)
                     (increase
                            (n_communicaterockdata ?r ?l ?p ?x ?y)
                            1)
              )
       )

       (:action communicateimagedata
              :parameters (?r - rover ?l - lander ?o - objective ?m - mode ?x - waypoint ?y - waypoint)
              :precondition (and (in ?r ?x)
                     (at_lander ?l ?y)(have_image ?r ?o ?m)(visible ?x ?y)(available ?r)(channel_free ?l)
                     (>= (energy ?r) 6)
              )
              :effect (and
                     (communicated_image_data ?o ?m)(available ?r)
                     (decrease (energy ?r) 6)
                     (increase (total-energy-used) 6)
                     (increase
                            (n_communicateimagedata ?r ?l ?o ?m ?x ?y)
                            1)
              )
       )
)
</pddl_domain>
